__e: Why don't you go over there and tell those people, real loud?
Please, little lad, won't you look yonder and tell the court if that is the man that killed your mother?
I don't want to eat. I want to go over there and talk with them.
I begged you to stop, but you insisted On finding a way to cross over.
You have to help us cross over.
Okay, first it started out as "awesome," then, you know, it went to "amazing."
